snippet: GREENBERGER--Myron. Myron Greenberger passed away peacefully on February 15th. Born in the Bronx, Mike was a loving and caring husband to wife Natalie, a wonderful father to children David and Janet, a loving grandfather and brother. An advertising executive with humor, grace and wit who will be greatly missed. 1/3
